title: Accessibility problems
description: When I launch the Help view, I need to first click on one of the 'live' areas (e.g. the banner with the tool buttons, the nav frame or the content frame) before the tab key starts working. The expected behavior is that the Help view should be starting in a way that can be immediately navigated via the keyboard.
OB: When I launch the Help view, the tab key does not actually do anything.
EB: The Help view should be starting in a way that can be immediately navigated via the keyboard.
SR:
1. Launch the Help view.
2. Observe that the tab key does not work.
3. To make the tab key work, click on one of the 'live' areas (e.g. the banner with the tool buttons, the nav frame or the content frame).
4. The tab key should now navigate through the elements of the Help view.
